summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of The Alley in Block 9, Greenwood Park 2nd Addition, being the alley between West 83rd Street and West 84th Street from 3rd Avenue Northwest to 6th Avenue Northwest; and certain other alleys; by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 15596 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
